condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 3.3 Strategic Alliances and Private Sector

description.narrative: PCO was able to achieve some of its original plans regarding CRB such as the PFP agenda and used innovative approaches to leverage private sector alliances to respond to the new context in the country. This included a public-private partnership to produce educational assets for children, the adaption of the corporate volunteering strategy, a partnership for social listening to inform other actions, alliances for COP actions and different fundraising related pilots. | Status:Met | As-of Date:11/01/2021
